sentences.en: A lot of the players began to feel they were untouchable.
sentences.cn: 许多球手开始觉得自己天下无敌。

sentences.en: All the articles are untouchable in most museums.
sentences.cn: 大多数的博物馆里的所有物品都是禁止触摸的.

sentences.en: All the articles are untouchable in the museum.
sentences.cn: 译文:博物馆内的一切展品禁止触摸.

sentences.en: All the articles are untouchable the museum.
sentences.cn: 展览馆内一切物品禁止触摸.

sentences.en: All the articles in the museum are untouchable.
sentences.cn: 博物馆内一切展品禁止触摸.

sentences.en: Arsenal are untouchable when Robert is on song.
sentences.cn: 他表现出色时阿森纳是不可战胜的.

sentences.en: Domingos is untouchable as far as we are concerned.
sentences.cn: 对于我们来说,多明戈是遥不可及的人.

sentences.en: Existing paragraphs are untouchable, but new ones can be added between older ones.
sentences.cn: 已有的段落不能改变, 但新的段落可以添加到旧段落之间.

sentences.en: For most people limits are untouchable. For the successful they are challenges.
sentences.cn: 众人在极限面前望而生畏, 成功者将它视为新一轮挑战.

sentences.en: Given his political connections, he thought he was untouchable.
sentences.cn: 他有一些政界关系，所以自认为谁也管不了他。

sentences.en: I am going to find out just how untouchable you are.
sentences.cn: 我要试试看你到底是不是老虎屁股摸不得.

sentences.en: I want to make it clear, however, that no one is untouchable in this investigation.
sentences.cn: 但我想说明白一点，这次调查谁都逃不了。

sentences.en: In most museums such articles are untouchable.
sentences.cn: 在大多数博物馆这些物品都是不能碰的.

sentences.en: They said because untouchable they can't eat in the same place.
sentences.cn: 村民们说因为那些孩子是贱民,贱民不能和他们一起吃饭.

sentences.en: To you, loneliness is real , yet unacknowledged, unnameable and untouchable.
sentences.cn: 孤独对你来说, 是不可说不可承认不可体会的一种存在.

words.tran_cn: 达不到的；不可批评的；不可捉摸的

trans.tran_cn: 不可及的，达不到的，不可接触的，不可捉摸的
trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is untouchable, you mean that they cannot be affected or punished in any way

trans.tran_cn: 贱民，被遗弃的人，棘手的事
